description: How do you train your servant to be completely submissive, never protesting, always obeying you, his master?  Take a few tips from Race Cooper.  He's having a training session with his man-servant, Rob Lee.  Every good master begins with some gentle licking and kissing as the servant is shackled and bound.  But this is only to give him a false sense of comfort.  Watch Race start with some quick, tight slaps with a horsewhip.  Then see him switch to using a cat 'o' nine tails for some more intense discipline.  Any decent master will take a break from more harsh training and give the servant a treat.  Race is unbinding Mr. Lee to feed him a nice, hard cock.  Mr. Lee thanks his master for such generosity.  Then it's back into chains for a hard, merciless fucking from Race.  Watch Mr. Lee endure very hard pounding in his ass from his good master.  You'll have a good idea of the best way to make sure your servant stays totally obedient.Enjoy!
series: NDE - E095 - Race Cooper & Rob Lee
title: Total Obedience
